scripts.clean: rimraf allure-results && rimraf allure-report && rimraf test-results && rimraf playwright-report && rimraf junit-results
scripts.chromium:dev: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=playwright.config.dev.ts && mv allure-results allure-results-dev
scripts.chromium:prod: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=playwright.config.prod.ts && mv allure-results allure-results-prod
scripts.test:dev: npm run clean && npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.dev.ts && mv allure-results allure-results-dev
scripts.test:prod: npm run clean && npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.prod.ts && mv allure-results allure-results-prod
scripts.test-head:dev: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=playwright.config.dev.ts --headed && mv allure-results allure-results-dev
scripts.test-head:prod: npm run clean && npx playwright test --project=chromium --config=playwright.config.prod.ts --headed && mv allure-results allure-results-prod
